com.ibm.streamsx.json.converters

Class TupleToJSONConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.streamsx.json.converters.TupleToJSONConverter

  • public class TupleToJSONConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    Converts SPL tuples and SPL tuple attributes to String representations of JSON values.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      TupleToJSONConverter()

      static java.lang.String convertArray(com.ibm.streams.operator.Tuple tuple, java.lang.String attrName)
      Converts an SPL tuple attribute (that must be a list) to a String representation of a JSONArray
      static java.lang.String convertTuple(com.ibm.streams.operator.Tuple tuple)
      Converts an SPL tuple to a String representation of a JSONObject

    • Method Detail

      • convertTuple

        public static java.lang.String convertTuple(com.ibm.streams.operator.Tuple tuple)
                                     throws java.io.IOException
        Converts an SPL tuple to a String representation of a JSONObject
        Parameters:
        tuple - Tuple to be converted
        Returns:
        String representation of a JSONObject
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there was a problem converting the SPL tuple

      • convertArray

        public static java.lang.String convertArray(com.ibm.streams.operator.Tuple tuple,
                                            java.lang.String attrName)
                                     throws java.io.IOException
        Converts an SPL tuple attribute (that must be a list) to a String representation of a JSONArray
        Parameters:
        tuple - Tuple containing the attribute to be converted
        attrName - Name of the attribute to convert
        Returns:
        String representation of a JSON array
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there was a problem converting the SPL tuple attribute
